divs: Sighting DetailsThree friends were driving east on Hwy 98, when they got to Airport Road they noticed 3 red lights in the south eastern sky traveling east. The lights were in a triangle formation. The sighting lasted only 6 seconds. At the same time a seperate group of friends were at 98 Hwy and Gulf Shore Drive and saw 3 red lights in the south eastern sky traveling in a triangle formation going due east. I was not a witness to the sighting. I was asked to submit this report.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Destin
There were no other sightings in Destin on or around October 19th 2011
Summary: Three friends saw 3 red lights in the shape of a triangle heading southeast.
